summary: The eyeluvpaarthurnax 1st Tri-Annual UNOFFICIAL SKYRIM "GURU" AWARDS [USGA]
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][size=5]
eyeluvpaarthurnax 1st Tri-Annual UNOFFICIAL SKYRIM "GURU" AWARDS[/size][/u]

[size=5][[/size][size=6]USGA[/size][size=5]][/size][/center]

[center][youtube]H8hcUXEXlb0[/youtube][/center]


[u][size=5][b]SKYRIM [/b]"[b]GURU[/b]" [b]AWARDS[/b][/size][/u]
[size=4]
[/size][size=4]IMHO, the SKYRIM Mod-Community is the ABSOLUTE GREATEST in the Gaming-World, an Incredibly Generous/Talented UNIFICATION brought together by the LOVE of the Greatest Mod-Able PC Role-Playing Game in Existence
[/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]eyeluvpaarthurnax's UNOFFICIAL SKYRIM "GURU" AWARDS [USGA] is simply a humble-effort to show our Mod-Community the APPRECIATION & RECOGNITION they Deserve
[/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]
[/size][u][size=5]"[b]UNOFFICIAL[/b]"[/size]
[/u][size=4]
[/size][size=4]USGA is entitled "UNOFFICIAL", as it is currently based on eyeluvpaarthurnax's "subjective" choices of Nominees/Winners; however, its ultimate-goal is to become an "OFFICIAL" Awards-Program via "objective" Community-Based votes for Nominees/Winners - if you indeed share this desire, please leave a COMMENT in the Posts-Section above stating so & please ENDORSE the Project too (based on the feedback from your comments, & endorsements, USGA will be developed into a Full-Fledged VOTING Community-Endeavor

[/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]
[/size][b][u][size=5]SUBMIT YOUR SUGGESTIONS for NOMINEES[/size]
[/u][/b][size=4]
[/size][size=4]Presently, you can indeed Submit Your Suggestions for NOMINEES, thru COMMENTS in the POSTS-SECTION above

[/size][size=4]
[/size][b][u][size=5]SUBMIT YOUR SUGGESTIONS for Award-CATEGORIES[/size]
[/u][/b][size=4]
[/size][size=4]In relation to the Award-Categories listed below, you can also Submit Your Suggestions for ADDITIONAL Award-Categories, thru COMMENTS in the POSTS-SECTION above as well[/size]


[b][size=5]NB[/size][/b][size=4]: INSTRUCTIONS (they're very simple) for VOTING thru Comments in the Posts-Section can be downloaded thru the FILES-Section (PDF ~ also, as per NEXUS Rules/Regulations, downloading this file is the only way which you will be able to Endorse the Project)[/size]




[size=5][u][b]CATEGORY of AWARDS
[/b][/u][/size]
[size=4][b]I [/b]- BEST MOD AUTHORS
[/size]
[size=4] on the NEXUS[/size]
[size=4] from "LL"

[/size]

[/size]
[size=4] IMMERSION ~ UTILITY ~ GAMEPLAY ENHANCEMENT[/size]
[size=4] ADULT 18+

[/size]
[size=4][b]III [/b]- BEST TUTORIAL CREATORS
[/size]
[size=4] CK[/size]
[size=4] PERFORMANCE OPTIMIZATION

[/size]
[size=4][b]IV [/b]- BEST TUTORIALS
[/size]
[size=4] on YOUTUBE[/size]
[size=4] on the NEXUS

[/size]
[size=4][b]V [/b]- BEST MOD REVIEWERS
[/size]
[size=4] on YOUTUBE[/size]
[size=4] INDEPENDENT

[/size]
[size=4][b]VI [/b]- BEST MOD REVIEWS
[/size]
[size=4] on YOUTUBE[/size]
[size=4] INDEPENDENT

[/size]
[size=4][b]VII [/b]- LEGENDARY ACHIEVEMENT
[/size]
[size=4] COMMUNITY VETERANS[/size]
[size=4] NEXT-GEN

[/size]
[size=4][b]VIII [/b]- HONORARIUM
[/size]
[size=4] LEGENDS IN-THEIR-OWN-TIME[/size]
[size=4] RETIRED/RIP
[/size]


[b][size=5]NB[/size][/b][size=4]: [/size][size=5]NOMINEES TBA: [b]FEB 15th[/b], '[b]17[/b]
      WINNERS TBA: [b]MAR 15th[/b], '[b]17[/b][/size]

[size=4]

[/size][size=4]
[/size][b][u][size=5]eyeluvpaarthurnax[/size]
[/u][/b][size=4]
... an Actor/Filmmaker who's simply MAGNANIMOUSLY ENTHRALLED with SKYRIM - it's the only game I've ever played & will ever play - SKYRIM's Role-Playing/Cinematic potential, indeed made possible only by our SPECTACULAR Mod-Community, lends itself superbly to similarities in the Acting/Filmmaking world ...
[/size]


[size=5][center]Thank You ALL for Visiting USGA

Lotz o' Luv
eyeluvpaarthurnax[/center][/size]
author: eyeluvpaarthurnax
